QuestData.Title: A Most Puzzling Circumstance
QuestData.Description: You have accomplished the truly impossible. The brood mother of the Black Dragonflight lies dead at your feet. Seize her head and deliver it to Arnak Fireblade.
QuestData.LogDescription: Take the Head of Onyxia to Arnak Fireblade in the Cleft of Shadow.
QuestData.CompletionText: What is the meaning of this?!
QuestData.RewardText: You've brought me the head of someone who is... No, best not to think about it too hard. You'll be wanting recompense for your heroic deeds, no doubt.
